title: Edge Wars Heat Up as Arm Aims to Outflank Intel, Qualcomm
author: Jeffrey Burt
description: Arm's v9 platform redefines edge computing with billion-parameter AI models, microcontroller elimination, and seamless integration with leading frameworks for developers pushing AI to the extreme edge.
cntitle: 边缘战争升温，Arm 旨在超越英特尔和高通
cndescription: Arm 的 v9 平台通过数十亿参数的 AI 模型、微控制器的消除以及与领先框架的无缝集成，重新定义了边缘计算，为将 AI 推向极致边缘的开发者提供了支持。
